description: Access real-time US weather forecasts, alerts, radar, and station observations from the National Weather Service. Retrieve aviation products including TAFs and SIGMETs for flight planning. Build location-aware features with point metadata, grid forecasts, and zone products.

tools.name: alerts_query
tools.description: Returns all alerts

anyOf.description:
Marine area code as defined in NWS Directive 10-302:
* AM: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast south of Currituck Beach Light NC following the coastline into Gulf of Mexico to Ocean Reef FL including the Caribbean
* AN: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast from Canadian border south to Currituck Beach Light NC
* GM: Gulf of Mexico and along the U.S. Gulf Coast from the Mexican border to Ocean Reef FL
* LC: Lake St. Clair
* LE: Lake Erie
* LH: Lake Huron
* LM: Lake Michigan
* LO: Lake Ontario
* LS: Lake Superior
* PH: Central Pacific Ocean including Hawaiian waters
* PK: North Pacific Ocean near Alaska and along Alaska coastline including the Bering Sea and the Gulf of Alaska
* PM: Western Pacific Ocean including Mariana Island waters
* PS: South Central Pacific Ocean including American Samoa waters
* PZ: Eastern North Pacific Ocean and along U.S. West Coast from Canadian border to Mexican border
* SL: St. Lawrence River above St. Regis

area.description:
State/territory code or marine area code
This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: point, region, region_type, zone

items.description:
UGC identifier for a NWS forecast zone or county.
The first two letters will correspond to either a state code or marine area code (see #/components/schemas/StateTerritoryCode and #/components/schemas/MarineAreaCode for lists of valid letter combinations).
The third letter will be Z for public/fire zone or C for county.

zone.description:
Zone ID (forecast or county)
This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region, region_type

point.description:
Point (latitude,longitude)
This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, region, region_type, zone

active.description: List only active alerts (use /alerts/active endpoints instead)

items.description:
Marine region code. These are groups of marine areas combined.
* AL: Alaska waters (PK)
* AT: Atlantic Ocean (AM, AN)
* GL: Great Lakes (LC, LE, LH, LM, LO, LS, SL)
* GM: Gulf of Mexico (GM)
* PA: Eastern Pacific Ocean and U.S. West Coast (PZ)
* PI: Central and Western Pacific (PH, PM, PS)

region.description:
Marine region code
This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region_type, zone

region_type.description:
Region type (land or marine)
This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region, zone

tools.name: alerts_active
tools.description: Returns all currently active alerts

tools.name: alerts_active_count
tools.description: Returns info on the number of active alerts

tools.name: alerts_active_zone
tools.description: Returns active alerts for the given NWS public zone or county

tools.name: alerts_active_area
tools.description: Returns active alerts for the given area (state or marine area)

anyOf.description:
Marine area code as defined in NWS Directive 10-302:
* AM: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast south of Currituck Beach Light NC following the coastline into Gulf of Mexico to Ocean Reef FL including the Caribbean
* AN: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast from Canadian border south to Currituck Beach Light NC
* GM: Gulf of Mexico and along the U.S. Gulf Coast from the Mexican border to Ocean Reef FL
* LC: Lake St. Clair
* LE: Lake Erie
* LH: Lake Huron
* LM: Lake Michigan
* LO: Lake Ontario
* LS: Lake Superior
* PH: Central Pacific Ocean including Hawaiian waters
* PK: North Pacific Ocean near Alaska and along Alaska coastline including the Bering Sea and the Gulf of Alaska
* PM: Western Pacific Ocean including Mariana Island waters
* PS: South Central Pacific Ocean including American Samoa waters
* PZ: Eastern North Pacific Ocean and along U.S. West Coast from Canadian border to Mexican border

tools.name: alerts_active_region
tools.description: Returns active alerts for the given marine region

tools.name: alerts_types
tools.description: Returns a list of alert types

tools.name: alerts_single
tools.description: Returns a specific alert

tools.name: cwsu
tools.description: Returns metadata about a Center Weather Service Unit

tools.name: cwas
tools.description: Returns a list of Center Weather Advisories from a CWSU

tools.name: cwa
tools.description: Returns a list of Center Weather Advisories from a CWSU

tools.name: sigmetQuery
tools.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs

tools.name: sigmetsByATSU
tools.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs for the specified ATSU

tools.name: sigmetsByATSUByDate
tools.description: Returns a list of SIGMET/AIRMETs for the specified ATSU for the specified date

tools.name: sigmet
tools.description: Returns a specific SIGMET/AIRMET

time.description: Time (HHMM format). This time is always specified in UTC (Zulu) time.

tools.name: glossary
tools.description: Returns glossary terms

tools.name: gridpoint
tools.description: Returns raw numerical forecast data for a 2.5km grid area

tools.name: gridpoint_forecast
tools.description: Returns a textual forecast for a 2.5km grid area

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
* forecast_temperature_qv: Represent temperature as QuantitativeValue
* forecast_wind_speed_qv: Represent wind speed as QuantitativeValue

units.description: Use US customary or SI (metric) units in textual output

tools.name: gridpoint_forecast_hourly
tools.description: Returns a textual hourly forecast for a 2.5km grid area

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
* forecast_temperature_qv: Represent temperature as QuantitativeValue
* forecast_wind_speed_qv: Represent wind speed as QuantitativeValue

units.description: Use US customary or SI (metric) units in textual output

tools.name: gridpoint_stations
tools.description: Returns a list of observation stations usable for a given 2.5km grid area

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
* obs_station_provider: Include the data provider in the metadata about observation stations

tools.name: icons
tools.description: Returns a forecast icon. Icon services in API are deprecated.

tools.name: iconsDualCondition
tools.description: Returns a forecast icon. Icon services in API are deprecated.

tools.name: icons_summary
tools.description: Returns a list of icon codes and textual descriptions. Icon services in API are deprecated.

tools.name: satellite_thumbnails
tools.description: Returns a thumbnail image for a satellite region. Image services in API are deprecated.

tools.name: station_observation_list
tools.description: Returns a list of observations for a given station

tools.name: station_observation_latest
tools.description: Returns the latest observation for a station

tools.name: station_observation_time
tools.description: Returns a single observation.

tools.name: tafs
tools.description: Returns Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts for the specified airport station.

tools.name: taf
tools.description: Returns a single Terminal Aerodrome Forecast.

time.description: Time (HHMM format). This time is always specified in UTC (Zulu) time.

tools.name: obs_stations
tools.description: Returns a list of observation stations.

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
* obs_station_provider: Include the data provider in the metadata about observation stations

tools.name: obs_station
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given observation station

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
* obs_station_provider: Include the data provider in the metadata about observation stations

tools.name: office
tools.description: Returns metadata about a NWS forecast office

anyOf.description: Three-letter identifier for a NWS Regional HQ.
Three-letter identifier for NWS National HQ.

tools.name: office_headline
tools.description: Returns a specific news headline for a given NWS office

anyOf.description: Three-letter identifier for a NWS Regional HQ.
Three-letter identifier for NWS National HQ.

tools.name: office_headlines
tools.description: Returns a list of news headlines for a given NWS office

anyOf.description: Three-letter identifier for a NWS Regional HQ.
Three-letter identifier for NWS National HQ.

tools.name: point
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given latitude/longitude point

tools.name: point_stations
tools.description: Returns a list of observation stations for a given point

tools.name: radar_servers
tools.description: Returns a list of radar servers

reportingHost.description: Show records from specific reporting host

tools.name: radar_server
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given radar server

reportingHost.description: Show records from specific reporting host

tools.name: radar_stations
tools.description: Returns a list of radar stations

host.description: Show latency info from specific LDM host

stationType.description: Limit results to a specific station type or types

reportingHost.description: Show RDA and latency info from specific reporting host

tools.name: radar_station
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given radar station

host.description: Show latency info from specific LDM host

reportingHost.description: Show RDA and latency info from specific reporting host

tools.name: radar_station_alarms
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given radar station alarms

tools.name: radar_queue
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given radar queue

tools.name: radar_profiler
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given radar wind profiler

tools.name: products_query
tools.description: Returns a list of text products

tools.name: product_locations
tools.description: Returns a list of valid text product issuance locations

tools.name: product_types
tools.description: Returns a list of valid text product types and codes

tools.name: product
tools.description: Returns a specific text product

tools.name: products_type
tools.description: Returns a list of text products of a given type

tools.name: products_type_locations
tools.description: Returns a list of valid text product issuance locations for a given product type

tools.name: location_products
tools.description: Returns a list of valid text product types for a given issuance location

tools.name: products_type_location
tools.description: Returns a list of text products of a given type for a given issuance location

tools.name: latest_product_type_location
tools.description: Returns latest text products of a given type for a given issuance location with product text

tools.name: zone_list
tools.description: Returns a list of zones

items.description:
UGC identifier for a NWS forecast zone or county.
The first two letters will correspond to either a state code or marine area code (see #/components/schemas/StateTerritoryCode and #/components/schemas/MarineAreaCode for lists of valid letter combinations).
The third letter will be Z for public/fire zone or C for county.

anyOf.description:
Marine area code as defined in NWS Directive 10-302:
* AM: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast south of Currituck Beach Light NC following the coastline into Gulf of Mexico to Ocean Reef FL including the Caribbean
* AN: Western North Atlantic Ocean and along U.S. East Coast from Canadian border south to Currituck Beach Light NC
* GM: Gulf of Mexico and along the U.S. Gulf Coast from the Mexican border to Ocean Reef FL
* LC: Lake St. Clair
* LE: Lake Erie
* LH: Lake Huron
* LM: Lake Michigan
* LO: Lake Ontario
* LS: Lake Superior
* PH: Central Pacific Ocean including Hawaiian waters
* PK: North Pacific Ocean near Alaska and along Alaska coastline including the Bering Sea and the Gulf of Alaska
* PM: Western Pacific Ocean including Mariana Island waters
* PS: South Central Pacific Ocean including American Samoa waters
* PZ: Eastern North Pacific Ocean and along U.S. West Coast from Canadian border to Mexican border
* SL: St. Lawrence River above St. Regis

Land region code. These correspond to the six NWS regional headquarters:
* AR: Alaska Region
* CR: Central Region
* ER: Eastern Region
* PR: Pacific Region
* SR: Southern Region
* WR: Western Region

tools.name: zone_list_type
tools.description: Returns a list of zones of a given type

tools.name: zone
tools.description: Returns metadata about a given zone

tools.name: zone_forecast
tools.description: Returns the current zone forecast for a given zone

tools.name: zone_obs
tools.description: Returns a list of observations for a given zone

tools.name: zone_stations
tools.description: Returns a list of observation stations for a given zone

Feature-Flags.description:
Enable future and experimental features (see documentation for more info):
